title: (x) Sheffield Wednesday logo Bauhaus sans - Horatio {Florian}
content:
Can anyone ID the Sheffield Wednesday font or suggest somthing close to it? Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001925im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Sheffield_4676.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Doc-Request logo sans - ITC Franklin Gothic {Mili}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001925/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43990 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Red, Red Blood" classic serif face - Bulmer, Caslon 540 {David H, Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001925/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43292 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Povl

comments.content: Wow, you’re fast Florian. Thanks! P
